title: Audit the Cybersecurity Incident Response Plan
description: An IT auditor assesses the company's cybersecurity incident response (IR) plan.

tasks.description: Review the IR plan documentation to ensure it includes key components like roles and responsibilities, communication protocols, and escalation procedures.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor confirms the plan is well-documented and comprehensive.

tasks.description: Review the logs from the last tabletop IR exercise to see how the team performed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor identifies that the exercise revealed a weakness in the communication plan.

tasks.description: Verify that the issues identified in the tabletop exercise have been remediated.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor confirms that the IR plan was updated based on the lessons learned.
